entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:27 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 03:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -12.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -16.4°C
Wind: WSW 48 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
